item.title: CVE-2023-48743|2023-11-30T10:29:05.909Z -- paul%20menard -- simply%20exclude
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Paul Menard Simply Exclude allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects Simply Exclude: from n/a through 2.0.6.6.
